name: Card
description: Represents a square on which players draw cards. A Card can represent Chance square or Community Chest square.

constants.name: CHANCE_CARD
constants.description: Boolean choice 0 represents a chance card

constants.name: COMMUNITY_CHEST_CARD
constants.description: Boolean choice 1 represents a community chest card

constants.name: CHANCE_PER_HOUSE_FEE
constants.description: Fee charged by the chance building card per house built

constants.name: CHANCE_PER_HOTEL_FEE
constants.description: Fee charged by the chance building card per hotel built

constants.name: COMMUNITY_CHEST_PER_HOUSE_FEE
constants.description: Fee charged by the community chest building card per house built

constants.name: COMMUNITY_CHEST_PER_HOTEL_FEE
constants.description: Fee charged by the community chest building card per hotel built

instanceVariables.name: _card_type
instanceVariables.description: Denotes whether this card is a chance card or a community chest card

methods.name: __init__()
methods.description: Initializes a card of the given type, where the constants CHANCE_CARD and COMMUNITY_CHEST_CARD can be used to denote the type

methods.name: landed()
methods.description: Returns the GroupOfChanges resulting from the Player's landing on this Card
